name: Chocolate Cake
description: Chocolate Cake - sponge center with chocolate cream in the center

reviews.comment: Usually pretty heavy but can also be reduced by using oil rather than milk. Bonus Dairy Free option
Awesome desert, especially during the winter. Try not to have too mcuh cream/ice cream on the side!
Totally delicious fresh pizza, heavy on the cheese though so need to watch how many slices

name: Moroccan Style Cous Cous
description: Moroccan Style Cous Cous from local supermarket

reviews.comment: Reasonably healthy although depends which supermarket you get it from.
Super bad, super fatty but completely awesome!
Bit bland but certainly fills the need for a splurge!
